params.admin_: , administrator of contract, generally speaking, will be Timelock
params.implementation_: , address of current implementation to delegate calls to
params.note_: address of Note ERC20 Contract to receive funds from

delegateToImplementation(bytes).details: It returns to the external caller whatever the impledmentation returns or forwards reverts

returns._0: bytes returned bytes from the delegater

delegateToViewImplementation(bytes).details: It returns to the external caller whatever the implementation returns or forwards reverts  There are an additional 2 prefix uints from the wrapper returndata, which we ignore since we make an extra hop.

returns._0: bytes returned bytes from the delegatecall

params.amount: amount of funds to send to recipient

params.implementation_: The address of the new implementation for delegation

delegateToImplementation(bytes).notice: Delegates execution to the implementation contract

delegateToViewImplementation(bytes).notice: Delegates execution to an implementation contract

queryCantoBalance().notice: Method to query current balance of CANTO in the treasury using a DELEGATECALL

queryNoteBalance().notice: Method to query current balance of NOTE in the treasury using a DELEGATECALL

sendFund(address,uint256,string).notice: Method to send funds to recipient using DELEGATECALL

setImplementation(address).notice: Method called by the admin to update the implementation of the delegator
